channel.title: Phabricator's (not so) fabulous advice for password managnent
channel.description:
I just had to reset my phabricator password and the password reset e-mail I received had some great advice to keep me from forgetting/loosing my password again. ( this is no joke )
>Condolences on forgetting your password. You can use this link to reset it: https://phabricator.whonix.org/login/**** > > After you set a new password, consider writing it down on a sticky note and attaching it to your monitor so you don't forget again! Choosing a very short, easy-to-remember password like "cat" or "1234" might also help. > > Best Wishes, Phabricator
All the time and effort put into creating unbreakable passwords as well as finding a secure password manager was a waste of time! Why didn't I think of this?

item.title: Phabricator's (not so) fabulous advice for password managnent
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Unbelievable.

Looks like phabricator project exists for decades and they never updated
that part.

Read full topic

item.title: Phabricator's (not so) fabulous advice for password managnent
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
I just had to reset my phabricator password and the password reset e-mail I received had some great advice to keep me from forgetting/loosing my password again. ( this is no joke )

Condolences on forgetting your password. You can use this link to reset it: https://phabricator.whonix.org/login/****

After you set a new password, consider writing it down on a sticky note and attaching it to your monitor so you don’t forget again! Choosing a very short, easy-to-remember password like “cat” or “1234” might also help.

Best Wishes, Phabricator

All the time and effort put into creating unbreakable passwords as well as finding a secure password manager was a waste of time! Why didn’t I think of this?

Read full topic
item.source: Phabricator's (not so) fabulous advice for password managnent
